reviewText: I wanted to buy this DVD to hear Joseph Wolverton who sang so well in the Silvano recording, but they will not ship to my country. But it is available in You Tube complete. I never liked the Royal Albert Hall because of its superornamented circus appearance. It is not the best place for opera and less for an opera as Aida. Wolverton was fine as well as the ladies, but the production is so ugly and ridiculous that I stopped listening after Ritorna vincitor..
